names.description: Determines how names will be displayed in lists.

logo_url.description: The logo shown on the desktop header. The URL may be relative from app/public/.. or absolute.

background.description: The background colour used for the desktop and mobile headers.

rainbow.description: Determines if a rainbow is shown in the footer.

accessibility_buttons.description: Determines if accessibility buttons are shown in the footer.

collect_user_agent.description: Determines if user agent strings are collected.

collect_referrer.description: Determines if referrer URLs are collected.
